data.title: Vikram: Latest News, News Articles, Photos, Videos
data.meta_description: Find Latest News, Videos and Pictures about Vikram. Explore latest updates, news, information from NewsBytes. All about Vikram.
data.text:

Malavika Mohanan

The much-awaited Tamil film, Thangalaan, starring Chiyaan Vikram and directed by Pa Ranjith, is set to release on Thursday (August 15).
